description.value:
This 1-inch tall figurine depicts a crouched praying mantis. It's usually carved from green jade, crimson marble, or purple porphyry. Regardless of the figurine's material composition, its gemstone eyes are always a dull ruby red that seems to drink light.

Activate—Phantasmal Assassin 2 (concentrate, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vision of Death] (@Check[type:will|dc:28|traits:death,emotion,fear,mental|options:spell]). To the target, it always appears as if they are being attacked by an immense praying mantis.

Activate—Scouting Eye 1 minute (concentrate, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Scouting Eye].
